question: As per the recent survey of Chief Executive Officers (CEOs) by consultancy firm PwC, which country has the highest growth prospects?
explanation:
The leading international consultancy firm PwC recently released the results of its annual survey of Chief Executive Officers (CEOs) across the world. The firm surveyed more than 1,580 CEOs in 83 countries about global economy prospects. As per the survey, the United States has the highest growth prospects, according to the CEOs.
China remained in the second place while India retained the position of the fourth rank. The report also stated that 53 per cent of global CEOs believe international economic growth would decline in the next 12 months.
